resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/108204</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>108204</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770201674</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Faraday's Law </string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gesetz Faraday</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Loi de Faraday</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Lei De Faraday</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Legge Del Faraday</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Νόμος του Faraday</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ley De Faraday</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Light a light bulb by waving a magnet. This demonstration of Faraday's Law shows you how to reduce your power bill at the expense of your grocery bill.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Beleuchten Sie eine Glühlampe, indem Sie einen 
Magneten wellenartig bewegen. Diese Demonstration von Gesetz 
Faraday zeigt Ihnen, wie man Ihre Energie Rechnung auf Kosten von 
Ihrer Lebensmittelgeschäftrechnung verringert.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Allumez une ampoule en ondulant un aimant. 
Cette démonstration de la loi de Faraday vous montre comment 
réduire votre facture de puissance aux dépens de votre facture 
d'épicerie.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ilumine um bulbo claro acenando um ímã. 
Esta demonstração da lei de Faraday mostra-lhe como reduzir 
sua conta da potência à custa de sua conta do mantimento.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Illumini una lampadina fluttuando un magnete. 
Questa dimostrazione di legge del Faraday vi mostra come ridurre
la vostra fattura di potenza a scapito della vostra fattura della 
drogheria.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανάψτε έναν ελαφρύ βολβό με τον κυματισμό ενός 
μαγνήτη. Αυτή η επίδειξη του νόμου του Faraday σας 
εμφανίζει πώς να μειώσει το λογαριασμό δύναμής σας εις βάρος 
του λογαριασμού παντοπωλείων σας.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Encienda una bombilla agitando un imán. 
Esta demostración de la ley de Faraday le muestra cómo reducir
su cuenta de la potencia a expensas de su cuenta de la tienda de 
comestibles.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770201674</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>no</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>108204</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/faradays-law</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
